sys_hub_flow_stage.label: Send Customer Details about holiday package

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Send customer email to confirm booking

sys_variable_value.value:
Hi

You will be pleased to know that your Holiday Experience has been successfully booked with Dream Bookings.


Please contact Dream bookings customer support team if you have any questions or need to cancel your booking at anytime.

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Send Customer Details about holiday package

sys_variable_value.value: Send Customer details about their holiday package

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Send customer email to confirm booking

sys_variable_value.value:
Hi

You will be pleased to know that your Holiday Experience has been successfully booked with Dream Bookings.


Please contact Dream bookings customer support team if you have any questions or need to cancel your booking at anytime.

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Send Customer Details about holiday package
